actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide wage credits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program for Japanese-Americans who were detained or interned during World War II and performed compensated service during their detention or internment.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides wage credits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program (title II of the Social Security Act) for Japanese-Americans who were detained or interned during World War II and performed compensated service during their detention or internment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide wage credits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program for Japanese-Americans who were detained or interned during World War II and performed compensated service during their detention or internment.
